label2: The ultra-slim, ultra-chic COOLPIX S100 offers a host of features you desire in a camera that fits your social calendar. The S100Âs 16-MP CMOS sensor allows you to shoot vibrant images in low lighting conditions and its huge, high resolution 3.5-in. OLED Touch Screen makes viewing and sharing a breeze. label5: Reproducing every detail of each shot is a large 8.7 cm (3.5-in.) 820k-dot (approx.), high-definition (Full Wide VGA) OLED touch panel. OLED (organic light-emitting diode) technology does not require a backlight aseach diode provides its own light. This results in vastly higher contrast,truer blacks, and clearer color reproduction. The diodes also respond instantly to changes in current, which makes refresh rates far faster, while also eliminating afterimages. The display achieves a near-180Â° wide viewing angle.
label6: Touch control in a stylishly slim 18.1 mm design
label7: The intuitive fingertip control of this capacitive touch screen enhances the enjoyment of shooting, viewing and sharing photographs. Touch shutter releases the shutter after focus and exposure are locked on the subject with a single tap.
